summary: This bill, the RECOVER Act (H.R. 2283), establishes a three-year pilot program within the Department of Veterans Affairs. It provides grants to eligible non-profit outpatient mental health facilities to offer culturally competent, evidence-based mental healthcare to veterans. The bill outlines eligibility criteria, allowable uses of funds, and the Secretary's role in facility selection and training requirements. It includes provisions for grant amounts, reporting requirements to Congress, and authorizes $20 million annually for the program from 2025-2027.
